English: Chapter 1. The Beginning of the Journey
Chapter 5. The Queen in the Fog
A professional goblin plunderer as powerful as the human knights.
A wily, shrewd goblin who is skillful at making gunpowder.
A cruel, ferocious goblin warrior who leads a horde of goblins to cooperate with the Dark Legion.
The honorable leader of the Dryads.
A harpy wind master who lures male foes to her nest and kills them by absorbing their spirit.
Those who succumb to her seduction forget their fear of death and die happily.
A cruel, ferocious, elite orc warrior who serves as the orc swordsman, Sieg's right-hand man.
A powerful shaman of the Red Earth Tribe who used to be Chieftain of the tribe.
Once known as a descendant of the Dragon Slayer, it is the most powerful orc warrior.
An elite-level skeleton that came through the Dimensional Gate with Malduk. He leads the skeleton infantry.
A giant skeleton that came through the Dimensional Gate with Malduk. He guards over Krad Forest from higher ground.
A loyal servant of the Dark Lord that followed the king through the Dimensional Gate. He rules as the Father of the Undead.
A gnoll shaman elder. It uses forbidden spells that absorb the life of other creatures. It is more powerful than other spells or regular spells.
Captain of the Dark Elf Archers. Uses magic arrows to chase multiple targets simultaneously.
She used to manipulate the Dark Elves behind the scenes. She contracted with the devil and uses powerful dark magic and moonlight magic.
A goblin completely covered in armor. Smashes enemies using the weight of its armor.
Shoots blade-like arrows made of feathers to attack enemies in a straight line.
The fallen chief priest of the Orc tribe who uses powerful magic curses. Drops gigantic skeleton to cast curses.
An unusually powerful skeleton among the giant skeletons.\nUses its gigantic body to shake the ground and stomp enemies.
A golem created using ancient arcane magic. Uses both arms to stomp the ground and cause mysterious explosions.
A poisonous mother spider. Fights by spraying poison in all directions.
A giant, dragon-head worm. Calls together nearby giant worms.
Although it wields a rusty great sword, it is still a menacing skeleton.\nPushes enemies with powerful sword skills.
The Dryad, the so-called Judges of the Earth. Throws spears to blow up the earth's energy.
Captures enemies as its prey with its powerful scythe and poisonous tail.
The leader of the wolf pack with a giant frame and white body. Controls the wolves with its frosty roar.
The brutal leader of the horned-bears. Crushes enemies with iron-like claws and horns.
Yeah, I'm fine. But I'm worried about everyone who was left behind, damn.
It's okay. They won't go down so easily. They're strong.
Phew...This isn't easy, even for me.
While I knew how tough Demons are,
but I didn't think they'd be this persistent. I don't like it when they act all clingy...
Isn't that a shame, you traitor.
Hmph, the very fact that I fell for your foolish plan is an embarassment.
I wouldn't be fit to be called the Demon Strategist if I couldn't stop you, here and now.
You fought well to get here, but all this ends now!
Ugh! You maggots...! Wait and see, this isn't over yet!
Get lost, Malduk! Geez, such a sore loser.
Ha ha, that's as far as you go...
They're coming at us again, Kyle!
We're outnumbered. We can't take them all.
Ugh. I've also reached my limit.
We can't afford to do that! An opportunity like this won't come again.
Let me go! I'll deal with the Dark Lord myself!
Well, if that's what my love wants, I guess I should lend a hand.
I heard your request. You are my only friend.
Tarkas, Epis! No, Kyle! We can't send you alone!
Maria, I'm the only one who can do this job. You know that, right?
No, you'll die if you go!
How do you expect to defeat the Dark Lord in this condition!
I wouldn't call myself the best swordsman of humanity if I wasn't at least capable of that.
Please, can we get going? They're coming!
Ok, I'll break through! Support me, everyone!
Who goes there? How dare you set foot in here without permission...
I am Gadra, a mighty Troll warrior.
What is a troll warrior doing here?
Unlike the Arena, this is a dangerous place.
Heh heh. But the rewards are greater.
If you feel up to it, give it a try.
My name is Kasel, a squire in service to Orvelia.
We have been waiting for you.
We discovered a hidden vault under the royal chambers.
Much wealth has been uncovered, but monsters keep appearing.
We ask that you eliminate the monsters for the safety of Orvelia.
I think someone is calling you, Kasel.
Hello. My name is May and I work at the Shop.
We're handing out gifts in celebration of our store's grand opening.
If you come visit us, sir, we'll have something even more special for you!
Heh, let's go take a look at the shop, young, handsome knight!
Frey, I'm already embarrassed enough, so please don't...
We have weapons and armor that will suit a young, handsome knight!
Tap the Shop button to go to the shop!
You can use Rubies to refresh the Items list, too!
But if you browse and leave without buying anything...
Heh. Looks like you have no choice, Mr. Young, Handsome Knight.
About a century ago, a lone wizard opened the Demon's Gate\nand allowed Demons to invade the entire continent.
As the land went up in flames, heroes rose up against the Demons.
The heroes pushed past the Demons\nand arrived at the Dark Lord's fortress.
Kyle slew the Dark Lord with the Holy Sword of Aea,\nand then vanished leaving only the holy sword behind.
The leaderless Demons dispersed across the continent,
And the heroes sealed the holy sword in the World Tree.
A hundred years later, peace has been restored to the continent,\nand the wounds of the old war have been long forgotten.
Yet one peaceful day, Demon activity was sensed near the World Tree.
Orvel, the realm of humans, sent an expedition party\nto investigate the Demon situation.
Kasel, the edge of your sword looks very worn.
Yeah. I've been using it since I was on the city watch.
Don't you have a second sword? Why don't you use it?
Uh... how do I do that?
First, tap the Heroes button and select a hero to go to the Hero Info window.
Tap the item you want to equip, and then tap the Equip button.
It's not hard, give it a try!
Um, the sword is not bad, but something is amiss.
Then you should enhance the item.
All items can be enhanced regardless of their type.
Once an item has been enhanced, its abilities are strengthened.
Enhancing an item is similar to equipping items. Tap the Enhance button instead of Equip.
Hmm... My skills don't seem to deal much damage to enemies.
How about acquiring a new skill attribute?
Did you finish knighthood training, Kasel?
Ha ha ha. Of course I did!
Oh well, it can't be helped. Do you have any skill books?
There is an attribute you can pick up with the skill books you already have, Kasel. Let's try it!
First, open the Hero window and select the hero whose skills you want to enhance.
Tap Skills to open the skills window, and then tap the skill for the attribute you want to acquire.
There will be an Acquire Attribute button. You can enhance your skill attributes if you have enough skill books.
Not only do you acquire better skill attributes,
but you can also enhance skills to a number equal to your current level.
Enhancing skills consumes Gold, so be sure to save up for future costs!
Hm. That looks like a goblin base.
It's highly likely. I see why the number of goblins have increased.
I was wondering where they were coming from. It looks like they've set up their camp here.
Let's destroy it before they attack another village.
Good. A knight needs that kind of mettle.
Lead the way, I'll cover your back.
Huff, puff. That was quite a difficult fight.
Yes, but we gained a fair amount of loot at last.
There may be a few more outposts similar to this one.
We have no obligation to dispose them, but we'll get  loot if we do!
I'll leave it up to you.
The wolves we caught earlier dropped some armor.
It looks tougher than what you have on right now.
But the battle is about to start...
Haha. There is a simple way to equip gear before the battle starts.
Tap and hold the portrait of the hero on this screen.
Then you can jump to the corresponding Hero Info window.
Tap the Gear button in the Hero Info window,
and then tap the Auto Equip button below.
This way you can easily equip gear.
I was in such a hurry to leave the Tower of the Sages,
Of course, it's not like my flames are any weaker without my staff...
Why don't you try the Special Shop, Miss Cleo?
You can summon special items from the Special Shop.
We may even find high-quality items that suit you, Miss Cleo.
Oh... Of course, I knew that. Yes, indeed.
Well, let's quickly go to the Special Shop and summon some special items!
Oh no! I left my sword back there... This worn sword, on the other hand...
A warrior without his sword. I predict a bleak future.
When I was looking for you, I noticed you had left your sword behind in your room...
You're welcome! In the future, don't leave your equipment laying around!
This sword... I feel the great power of the Goddess Lua.
The holy sword doesn't reveal its power to anyone but its true owner.
Try equipping this rune on the Holy Sword Aea.
Runes enchant gear with special effects.
Runes are precious artifacts that contain magic powers!
Unfortunately, there aren’t too many pieces of equipment that can handle the true power of runes.
Ok, ok. Why don't you give it a try, Kasel? Let's see if she's speaking the truth.
For sure... I can feel more strength compared to before.
As you grow stronger, Kasel, you will be able to exert greater powers.
I want one of those, too!
Roi! Go and find me one! That's an order!
You have connected with many heroes already!\nPlease come again!
